sentences.english: The coastal lines of Aegean Sea are long and winding where scatters with many gulf and dotted with numerous and island.

sentences.english: A city of eastern Greece near the Aegean Sea.

sentences.english: Crete Island is the cradle of the ancient Aegean culture.

sentences.english: There were powerful pirates that sailed the Aegean and Mediterranean Seas.

More than a thousand islands scattered in the Aegean Sea as a string of glittering gems.

sentences.english: Aegean Greek restaurant is a small blue and white restaurant.

sentences.english: We have booked to go on a sailing holiday in the aegean.

sentences.english: From space, the development of ancient Greek culture-feeding can not be separated from the Aegean Sea.

sentences.english: In order to make a windmill-meter mark of the Long Island who is synonymous with the Aegean Islands.

sentences.english: Sea and sky merged, the ultimate interpretation of the Aegean-style romance.

sentences.english: The room overlooks the Aegean Sea, which you can view from a private pool with a hydro massage device.

sentences.english: Then the scenery of the Aegean Sea and those islands were in our memory forever.
